project_page module

class project_page.ProjectPage(main, name)[source]

Bases: TabPage

A widget for creating projects, opening projects, and displaying project status.

Provides: - Buttons to create a new project, open an existing project, or access recent projects. - A summary of the project’s status, showing either success or error details.

Methods:

app_formats = {'basic': {'INSTRUCTIONS': ('Instructions', 'combo', ['show', 'hide'], 180), 'LABEL1': (' ', 'label', None, 180), 'MODE': ('Mode', 'combo', ['basic', 'expert'], 180)}, 'expert': {'INSTRUCTIONS': ('Instructions', 'combo', ['show', 'hide'], 180), 'LABEL1': (' ', 'label', None, 180), 'MODE': ('Mode', 'combo', ['basic', 'expert'], 180), 'SHOW_TABS': ('Tabs', 'combo', ['normal', 'extended'], 180)}}
create_new_project()[source]

Create a new project and open it.

Displays a dialog to select a new folder, initializes the project, and loads it.

display_settings()[source]
load_project(config_path)[source]

Load the project and update the layout.

Parameters:

config_path (str) – Path to the project configuration file.

open_project_dialog()[source]

Open a file dialog to select a project configuration file.

open_recent_dialog()[source]

Open a file dialog to select a recent project configuration file.

project_formats = {'error': {'COLORFILE': ('Color File', 'read_only', '^(?!.*\\b(missing|error)\\b).*', 600), 'FOLDER': ('Folder', 'read_only', '^(?!.*\\b(missing|error)\\b).*', 600), 'MAKE': ('Make', 'read_only', '^(?!.*\\b(missing|error)\\b).*', 600), 'MAKEFILE': ('Makefile', 'read_only', '^(?!.*\\b(missing|error)\\b).*', 600), 'PROJECT': ('Project', 'read_only', None, 600), 'SCRIPT': ('Script', 'read_only', '^(?!.*\\b(missing|error)\\b).*', 600), 'SETTINGS': ('Settings', 'read_only', '^(?!.*\\b(missing|error)\\b).*', 600), 'STATUS': ('Status', 'read_only', '^(?!.*\\b(missing|error)\\b).*', 600)}, 'success': {'FOLDER': ('Folder', 'read_only', None, 600), 'PROJECT': ('Project', 'read_only', None, 600), 'STATUS': ('Status', 'read_only', None, 600)}}
restart_dialog(key, value)[source]
set_project_status(success)[source]

Update the project display layout based on load success.

Parameters:

success (bool) – True if the project loaded successfully; False otherwise.

show_file_dialog(dialog_type, title, file_type_filter='')[source]

Display a file or directory selection dialog.

Parameters:

  • dialog_type (str) – Type of dialog (“open_file”, “recent_file”, “directory”).

  • title (str) – Title of the dialog.

  • file_type_filter (str) – Filter for file types (used only for file selection).

Returns:

The selected file or directory path, or None if cancelled.

Return type:

str
